Eu achei o primeiro jogo incrÃ­vel mais muito rÃ¡pido. Oque mais me surpreendeu nesse segundo jogo, foi a histÃ³rias e diÃ¡logos construÃ­dos melhor que muitos jogos grandes por ai.

I'll be honest, 10/10

Easily one of the best games I've ever played.
The world is original and feels real.
The game itself is very absorbing and an unique experience. All of the levels are different- you always need to change your way of thinking to succeed.
And characters, man, you gotta love the characters.
We've got to experience only a few characters, but every single one of them..... i love every single one of them.

In my opinion, this is one of the best games ever made. The story, writing, setting, voice actors, puzzles and gameplay are literally perfect and make this a treat for any player. If you've not played this game yet you need to try it asap!
I got very angry playing co op
Very fun! Good puzzles, difficult at times. Would definitely recommend to someone looking for a longer game. or a challenge.

This is one of the best games I've ever played. It is a masterpiece and perfect in most ways. It has a great ending and I don't think it needs a sequel mainly because we probably won't get one if we wanted to because this is Valve were talking about. But overall this game is one of the best!
